DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness safety s-1 plus cisplatin versus 5-FU plus cisplatin first-line therapy treatment patient advance gastric cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Trial S-1 Plus Cisplatin Gastric Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control , open-label , multicenter study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm : S-1 plus cisplatin 5-FU plus cisplatin .
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma stomach inoperable locally advanced recurrent and/or metastatic disease . Male female . Age 18 75 . Previous chemotherapy advanced/metastatic disease ( prior adjuvant/neoadjuvant therapy allow least 6 month elapse completion adjuvant/neoadjuvant therapy enrolment study ) . Measurable disease , accord Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumours ( RECIST ) ECOG Performance status 0 , 1 2 Haematological , Biochemical Organ Function : Neutrophil count > 2.0 × 10 9/L , platelet count > 100 ×10 9/L . Serum bilirubin < 1.5 × upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; , AST ALT < 2.5 × ULN ( < 5 × ULN patient liver metastasis ) ; , alkaline phosphatase < 2.5 × ULN ( > 5 × ULN patient liver metastasis , Creatinine clearance > 60 mL/min . Signed informed consent . prior adjuvant/neoadjuvant therapy two regiment . Received investigational drug treatment within 30 day start study treatment . Patients active gastrointestinal bleeding . Neurological toxicity ≥ grade 2 NCICTCAE . Other malignancy within last 5 year , except carcinoma situ cervix , basal cell carcinoma . History clinical evidence brain metastasis . Serious uncontrolled systemic intercurrent illness , e.g . infection poorly control diabetes . Pregnancy woman . Subjects reproductive potential willing use effective method contraception .
